summary: I just doubled stats of all Dragons, and made them non-leveled, so, you can be killed by Ancient Dragons in beginning of your adventure.
descriptionHtml:
Dragons are most terrible creatures of Skyrim, but when you leveled up enought, you can kill them like a fly. There is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13102&navtag=file/images.php?id=13102&tab=3]Deadly Dragons lite mod[/url], but I liked to make my own, \'cause I don\'t want to put new Dragon types in to game.  

I just doubled stats of all Dragons, added more voices to them and made them non-leveled, so, you can be killed by Ancient Dragons in beginning of your adventure. IRL, your experiences didin\'t effects to deers and rats what you can see in the forest, and thats on the Dragons. There is not new Dragons, items or anything else like that, just bad-ass vanilla Dragons.

[b]1.1 Update[/b]
I added to Dragons more coices, and now they do more biting and smashing damage

[b]1.2 Update[/b]
Now there is two optional files:
[b]Non-leveled vanilla Dragons[/b] with vanilla skills etc, they are just non-leveled
[b]2x tougher Dragons[/b] so, they are leveled, but Dragons have same skills as in the Main file

No problems with other mods, expect with those, what changes vanilla Dragons stats and leveled lists.

[b]Install/Unistall:[/b] just put datafiles into Skyrim/Data, and check from Skyrim Launcer, that you use it.

You can allways add comment, if you want me to add something to this mod
You can use this for your own modding if you want, just put thanks for me
author: Globox68

files.name: Non-leveled and 2x tougher Dragons with more voices and more biting damage for Dragons
files.fileName: Non-leveled and 2x tougher Dragons with more voices and more biting damage for Dragons-13463.rar
